00027 /* Normally distributed random numbers with mean 0 and variance 1, scaled by
00028  * 100 to fit in integer. 256 samples.
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef __RANDOM_NORM_H_
00032 #define __RANDOM_NORM_H_

00052 
00053 int lastNrandIndex = 0;
00054 
00064 int RandomNorm(int scale)
00065 {
00066     lastNrandIndex++;
00067     if (lastNrandIndex > 255)
00068         lastNrandIndex = 0;
00069     return (nRandSamples[lastNrandIndex] * scale) / 100;
00070 }
00071 
00083 long RandomNorm2(int scale)
00084 {
00085    long nr = -600;
00086    for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++)
00087    {
00088        nr += Random(100);
00089    }
00090    return ((nr * scale)/100);
00091 }
00092 
00100 long RandomNorm3(int scale, int precision)
00101 {
00102    int iter = precision * 12;
00103    long s;
00104    long nr = (-iter * 100)/2;
00105    for (int i = 0; i < iter; i++)
00106    {
00107        nr += Random(100);
00108    }
00109    s = (10000 * iter)/12;
00110    s = Sqrt(s);
00111    return ((nr * scale)/s);
00112 }

00116 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00117 
00118 /* return maximum value in array */
00119 int ArrayMax(long v[])
00120 {
00121     int len = ArrayLen(v);
00122     int max = 0;
00123     for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
00124     {
00125         if (v[i] > max) max = v[i];
00126     }
00127     return max;
00128 }
00129 
00130 #define HIST 30
00131 #define SAMPLES 5000
00132 void TestRandomNorm ()
00133 {
00134     long r;
00135     long stat[HIST];
00136     int progressbar, zone;
00137     int i, x, w, h, max;
00138 
00139     TextOut(0,LCD_LINE1,"Normal Samples");
00140     for (i = 0; i < SAMPLES; i++)
00141     {
00142         progressbar = (100 * i) / SAMPLES;
00143         LineOut(0, LCD_LINE2 + 4, progressbar, LCD_LINE2 + 4);
00144         LineOut(0, LCD_LINE2 + 3, progressbar, LCD_LINE2 + 3);
00145         r = RandomNorm3(100,2);
00146 
00147         /* build histogram */
00148         for (zone = 0; zone < HIST; zone++)
00149         {
00150             /* 3-sigma confidence */
00151             if (-300 + zone * 600 / HIST <= r & r < -300 + (zone + 1) * 600 / HIST)
00152                 stat[zone]++;
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     ClearScreen();
00157     max = ArrayMax(stat);
00158     w = 100/HIST - 1;
00159     for (zone = 0; zone < HIST; zone++)
00160     {
00161         x = (100 * zone)/HIST;
00162         h = (63 * stat[zone])/max;
00163         RectOut(x, 0, w, h);
00164     }
00165     while(true);
00166 }
00167 /*
00168 task main()
00169 {
00170     TestRandomNorm();
00171 }
00172 */
00173 #endif /* ENABLE_TEST */
00174 #endif /* __RANDOM_NORM_H_ */
